comment: Amazing trip! The tour gu_ide was super knowledgeable, and the accommodations were perfect. Would definitely book again!
The beaches were stunning, but the transportation was delayed. Still a great experience overall!
Affordable and well-organized. I loved the hiking trails and local food recommendations!
The historical landmarks were breathtaking, but the itinerary felt rushed. Could have used more free time.
The adventure package was thrilling! Ziplining and river rafting were highlights of the trip.
